channel.title: Stonewood Standing Dungeon on Polar Larp

item.title: Floor 01: Spiders
item.description: Floor 1: Spiders x5 Floor 3: Black Unicorns x5 Floor 4: Gravemasters x5 Add lvl 20th level Fighter/Rogue/Scholar/Templar on top Floor 5: Wraiths x5 Add lvl 20th level Fighter/Rogue/Scholar/Templar on top Floor 6: Attercob Champions x5 Add lvl 20th level Fighter/Rogue/Scholar/Templar on top Floor 7: Vampire Regents x5 Add lvl 20th level Fighter/Rogue/Scholar/Templar on top Floor 8: Dark Elf Sword Masters x5 Dark Elf Sword MasterDescriptive Phrase: Armored Dark Elf Veteran160 Body40 ArmorImmunities: Resist Poison x5, Resist Charm x5, Resist Sleep x5, Phase x5Damage: ONLY BLADED WEAPONS20 Normal main hand /w Shield20 Normal main hand/10 Normal Offhand Florentine25 Normal 2h Weapon

item.title: Floor 09: Attercob Queen /Champions
item.description: The Mausoleum of Fallen Heroes in Stonewood is now unlocked as a standing dungeon. This Mausoleum has a magic training property that makes adventurers into the heroes of legend in Stonewood. The Vampire corrupting the top was defeated by adventurers and a Dwarf communed with an ancient hero Feaolin Ironleaf to help decide what to do with the Mayor of Stonewood. At the beginning of the next game, one of the guild masters will introduce the Mausoleum Dungeon and cast a Purify Earth on it to cleanse the “Green Eyes’ ’ near the entrance.

item.title: Floor 11: Fae Banshee x4 & Dullahan
item.description: Floor 11: Fae Banshee x4 & Dullahan Add lvl 30th level Fighter/Rogue/Scholar/Templar on top of Banshee ONLY Floor 12: Mummy King & High Mummy x4 Add lvl 30th level Fighter/Rogue/Scholar/Templar on top Floor 13: True Giant Add lvl 60th level Fighter Body of 130 (Total 630 Body)Add 70 Natural Armor (700 Body/Natural Armor)Add +8 to 1h Short/Longsword (30 Massive)Add +7 to 2h Weapon (40 Massive)

item.title: Floor 3: Black Unicorns
item.description: The Mausoleum of Fallen Heroes in Stonewood is now unlocked as a standing dungeon. This Mausoleum has a magic training property that makes adventurers into the heroes of legend in Stonewood. The Vampire corrupting the top was defeated by adventurers and a Dwarf communed with an ancient hero Feaolin Ironleaf to help decide what to do with the Mayor of Stonewood. At the beginning of the next game, one of the guild masters will introduce the Mausoleum Dungeon and cast a Purify Earth on it to cleanse the “Green Eyes’ ’ near the entrance.
